title: [搬运]我不是大自然的搬运工，我的大自然的创造者
author: zmdd
txt_content:
这个插件就是用来生成更好的地图的，

我也不好说，我就直接把官网的搬过来吧

This is a simple PocketMine Terrain Generator. It is based on the Superflat Generator, but mixes in the Diamond-Squarealgorithm to generate decent looking terrain.

Install by copying to your plugins directory. Use simpleworlds or simmilar to test.

你可以用多世界插件来试试

replies.txt_content:
